synopsis.text: He's a misfit, a pervert, and a descendant of a prestigious Inukami tamer family - meet Keita Kawahira. Tasked with dealing with mischievous spirits and demons, the Kawahira family is known for forming pacts with powerful dog spirits called Inukami. Keita, however, is the family's black sheep, charging people for his services and constantly landing himself in jail for indecent exposure. But don't underestimate him just yet. His Inukami partner, Youko, is fiercely loyal, incredibly strong, and extremely possessive. She'll stop at nothing to keep Keita all to herself, even if that means punishing him by teleporting him naked into the city. Despite their tumultuous relationship, Keita and Youko make an impressive team when it comes to battling the lewd spirits that plague their neighborhood. Is there more to this perverted outcast than meets the eye? Join Keita and Youko in their chaotic adventures and find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
